Rapid Annotator 2.0

Hello everyone!

It is a great pleasure to introduce myself to all of you. I am Gulshan Kumar from International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad India. I am a 4th year undergrad researcher pursuing my B.Tech in Computer Science and M.S by research in IIIT Hyderabad, India. My specific research domain is Computer Vision, Robotic Vision and Natural Language Processing.

The following list of blog posts will be related to Google Code of Summerâ€™s project : Rapid Annotator 2, and a detailed account of my adventures, what I learned in the months May through August, obstacles I faced and how finally I overcame those.

I by and large attempt to deliver as per documented in the GSoC Timeline in the proposal. I will endeavor to record each one of the deviations from the solutions / approaches as proposed and settled on in the proposal.

The link to the github repository source code : Rapid Annotator 2
